name: Filth (TheLastAmlas)
description:
The treasure hunter found the box.
He opened it with his shiny blade.
An ancient evil escaped from it, eating up everything that would be against it.
And only the torchlight could restrain him...
but only for now...

Fight the local monsters, search the chests and find a way out of these ill-fated dungeons!

Game made by ThelastAmlas and CloudyWAT
Music by AstmatikDreams

INSTRUCTION:

  • W - Step forward
  • S - Step back
  • A - Turn 90 degrees to the left
  • D - Turn 90 degrees to the right
  • Q - Turn 90 degrees down
  • E - Interaction
  • F - Attack
  • Light torches to slow down the spread of Filth.
  • Hold the "Open Carefully" button to carefully open the chest and not take damage.
  • If you have a Lockpick, you can quickly open the chest without taking damage.
  • Collect 13 sticks to restore the ladder.
  • Kill enemies to get sticks.
  • Treat monster bodies to slow down the spread of Filth.
  • Collect 5 healing potions and 10 sticks to restore Pandora's Box.
